spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Mwaxanaré is a 2nd-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). She regains her expended spell slots when she finishes a short or long rest. She knows the following warlock spells:

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 2} to hit. reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) piercing damage.
